programmes.show_description: In Sierra Nevada, 1977, a horseback ride turns into a nightmare when a group of riders discover a woman's dead body, discarded amongst the scenery. S4, Ep8
David Pearce, is awaiting sentencing after he was found guilty of murdering two young women and sexually assaulting seven others. S37, Ep24
A toddler tragically dies after being left inside his family's vehicle on a hot summer day in Atlanta, Georgia. S2, Ep14
Serial killer and rapist Stephen Port used a number of dating sites to lure four young men to his flat in Barking, where he poisoned them with lethal doses of date-rape drug GBH. S1, Ep1
Series presented by Nick Knowles which shows the split-second moments when everyday events are transformed into disasters and meets the people who lived to tell the tale. S4, Ep12/20
Series presented by Nick Knowles which shows the split-second moments when everyday events are transformed into disasters and meets the people who lived to tell the tale. S4, Ep13/20
Series presented by Nick Knowles which shows the split-second moments when everyday events are transformed into disasters and meets the people who lived to tell the tale. S4, Ep14/20
Series presented by Nick Knowles which shows the split-second moments when everyday events are transformed into disasters and meets the people who lived to tell the tale. S4, Ep15/20
Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
Dodger', the spaniel mix, is at the centre of a custody battle between his owners and the family that cared for him while they were unable to. S21, Ep189
Threats of wage garnishment, a guilty plea in an auto accident, and alleged auto theft come into play when a mother sues her son. S21, Ep190
A self-proclaimed nosy neighbour cares for a woman's Great Dane and is accused of spaying her unnecessarily. S21, Ep191
A woman grieves her loss of musical enjoyment when her violin teacher allegedly sells her a subpar violin. S21, Ep192
Punchy reality show about a female judge that has made a real impact on the American justice system. Judge Judy is real, honest and keen to get to the bottom of emotional cases. S24, Ep121
A newlywed sues a bridal-shop owner for delivering an allegedly damaged, custom-made wedding gown. S24, Ep122
A teenager insists that she took out a restraining on her ex-girlfriend, but her ex-roommate claims they are still dating and sues her for moving costs. S24, Ep123
After serving time, a young man must find a safe place to live. Instead, he is kicked out and accused of being disrespectful. S24, Ep124
A young boy is asked to leave the courtroom before things heat up in a case involving a mother protesting her son's lockout after a three-day tenancy. S18, Ep171
In an effort to regain custody of her child, a woman enters a sober living facility where she is accused of failing a drug test after a trip to see the Price Is Right. S18, Ep172
A woman denies stripping a mobile home clean when she left and is sued for property damage; she admits to accidentally starting a fire in the kitchen. S18, Ep173
A homeowner is horrified to discover that his prized trees have been completely cut down instead of just trimmed; the Judge gets to the root of the problem. S21, Ep214
Grandparents sue the father of their grandchild for an unpaid loan for lawyer fees used to dispute child custody with their own daughter. S21, Ep215
A litany of alleged hardships come to light when a man sues his ex-girlfriend for car damage and for breaking a lease. S21, Ep216
A woman claims she caught her boyfriend at a hotel with another woman and submits video evidence of him allegedly trying to break into her house. S21, Ep217
A woman files for a restraining order against her boyfriend after he allegedly throws a boot at her and bruises her. S21, Ep218
A woman sues her deceased grandson's former fianc√©e for the cost of a headstone after a $10,000 life insurance pay-out. S21, Ep219
A defendant is ill-prepared for questions from the Judge when she is sued by her ex-roommate for a security deposit. S21, Ep220
A pregnant woman accuses her brother of stranding her in Maryland while she was working for his trucking business; both want to stop the drama. S24, Ep137
A midwife makes the hard call to stay with a client whose baby just died instead of attending to a woman just beginning a difficult labour. S24, Ep138
A woman's jealous rage leads to a computer allegedly being thrown across the room and a cellphone being crushed. S24, Ep139
A couple move in with mum to improve credit scores and save for a new home; unfortunately, a fight over money and tools divide them. S24, Ep140
A woman is unaware that the home she inherited from her father has a $400k outstanding loan on it and is in danger of being foreclosed. S24, Ep1
While a woman is watching TV, her Husky allegedly escapes the home, enters a neighbour's house and mauls his kitten. S24, Ep2
A property owner blames her delinquency in pursuing ex-tenants for damages on her grave health issues and major surgery. S24, Ep3
A baseball coach faces time in prison or huge fines after a DUI charge; one of his player's parents bails him out. S24, Ep4
The Judge shares a phrase that her husband has not been able to utter. S24, Ep5
After a heated argument with his 34-year-old son, a man allegedly backs out of an agreement to help his ex. S24, Ep6
When asked to produce receipts for property damage, a man asks for the Judge's patience due to his loss of a relative in a mass shooting. S24, Ep7
A woman sues a cement mason for mistakenly tearing up her driveway; the mason claims he was a victim of a 'jack-hammering scam'. S24, Ep8
Before coming to court, a man receives a ruling that bars him entry to his own home; he accuses his ex-lover of lying and stealing. S24, Ep9
A daughter is outraged that her mother called authorities to perform a welfare check on her four children; the Judge sets her straight. S24, Ep10
A man comes to the rescue of his disabled mother while her daughter allegedly reneges on payback of a loan for her and her four children. S24, Ep11
While crossing the street in a motorised wheelchair, a woman is struck by an uninsured vehicle and suffers severe road rash. S24, Ep12
The Judge openly admits she dislikes a married man being sued by his ex-girlfriend; she says he went back to his wife and took her truck with him. S24, Ep13
A vehicle takes a severe 'knifing' when a woman vandalises her baby daddy's ex-girlfriend's vehicle. S24, Ep14

Innovative, value-for-money products brought directly to you at home. Shop 'til you drop whilst avoiding the hustle and bustle of the High Street.
The Judge learns about a new dog breed when an 8-year-old boy is allegedly attacked by a neighbour's pet. S21, Ep221
A man has buyer's remorse after spending over $8,000 on furniture; the salesperson points to a 'no-refund' policy clearly printed on the receipt. S21, Ep222
A woman is accused of stealing from the estate of an 80-year-old woman and then selling her furniture; she sues for slander and defamation. S21, Ep223
An elderly landlord calls the police because she fears a tenant has been a victim of terrible violence; alleged alcoholism and a police witness come into play. S21, Ep224
A man sues his adopted son's sister for parking tickets, impound fees and an unpaid loan for a car that's in his name. S21, Ep225
A man accuses his teenage cousin of having a serious drug problem and of vandalizing his property; the teen's mother claims their cousin embarrassed them online. S18, Ep174
Burglary, two counts of attempted sex abuse and a mother giving her child up for adoption come into play when unwed parents fight over property. S18, Ep175

While a business owner is on vacation, his large four-wheeler is taken on a crabbing joyride and gets irreparably stuck in the mud. S24, Ep125
A woman says she caught her live-in lover half naked, drunk and on the phone with another woman; he denies all charges including giving her a bloody nose. S24, Ep126
A behavioural therapist passes himself off as an expert on trailer repair leaving an aspiring food truck owner with an unworkable estimate. S24, Ep127
A Tinder date leads to a business relationship between a motivational speaker and a photographer and ends with a defamation fight. S24, Ep128
A sneak peek at a phone allegedly leads to an assault, false arrest and a scar on a man's face. S24, Ep129
A woman's wild effort to pick-up her car lands her in jail for alleged assault and theft; she sues for a false arrest. S24, Ep130
A man with skin cancer is sued by his mother for unpaid loans to buy a motorcycle, and to pay his medical bills. S18, Ep176
A man is called to testify against the mother of his child who is being sued by an ex-friend for stealing property. S18, Ep177
After knowing each other for only two weeks, a couple move in together; they end up fighting over appliances, credit cards, and a lawnmower. S18, Ep178
From tropical Hawaii to the frigid waters of Lake Ontario, experts reveal the clues nature leaves behind on a human corpse. S1, Ep1
Sophisticated crime fighters map the psychological and physical terrain of multiple murderers. S1, Ep2
From the tips of their ears to the soles of their feet - criminals are betrayed by the clues their own bodies leave behind. S1, Ep3
When Bennylyn Burke and her young daughter, Jellica, vanish after visiting a man she met online, police uncover a disturbing crime with international roots. S2, Ep1
Mark Martin boasted he wanted to become Nottingham's first serial killer - and he succeeded. After childhood, Martin spiralled into drug abuse and violent fantasies. S2, Ep2
Tai O'Donnell was a gifted 19-year-old with a bright future. But, when he entered a volatile relationship with Kamila Ahmad, things took a dark turn. S2, Ep3
